comment.author: 22271981@N07
comment._content: The correct name of this tower and the gate is Savoir Tower and Savoir Gate en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spasskaya_Tower The dome at the right side of tower is central dome of St Catherine Church of Ascension Convent (dismantled in 1929) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ascension_Convent
